eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
When the checkbox is checked, the condition `Checked` is verified.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the checkbox.

Checkbox cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
- Checkbox is hidden
- Checkbox's layer is hidden
- Checkbox is disabled

Checkbox can always be changed by an action.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Checkbox
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Checkbox that can be toggled by a left-click or touch.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Checkbox can be toggled by a left-click or touch. 

When the checkbox is checked, the condition `Checked` is TRUE.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the checkbox.

Checkbox cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
- Checkbox is hidden
- Checkbox's layer is hidden
- Checkbox is disabled

Checkbox can always be changed by an action.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Checkbox

events.comment: Fix inputs that create malformed checkboxes
Change shape painter based on properties
Set halo radius, if not specified

eventsFunctions.description: If checked, change to unchecked.  If unchecked, change to checked.
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleChecked
SetHaloRadius
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change halo radius of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetBorderThickness
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change border thickness of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetSideLength
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change side length of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetLineWidth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change line width of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the checkbox is checked
eventsFunctions.name: IsChecked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the checkbox is disabled
eventsFunctions.name: IsDisabled

eventsFunctions.description: Used to draw the outline of the checkbox (when it is unchecked) and the fill color (when checkbox is checked).
eventsFunctions.name: PrimaryColor

eventsFunctions.description: Used to fill the checkbox (when it is unchecked) and to draw the checkmark (when checkbox is checked)
eventsFunctions.name: SecondaryColor

eventsFunctions.description: Opacity of the halo while the checkbox is touched or clicked
eventsFunctions.name: HaloOpacityPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Opacity of the halo when the mouse is hovering near the checkbox
eventsFunctions.name: HaloOpacityHover

propertyDescriptors.label: Checked
propertyDescriptors.name: Checked

propertyDescriptors.label: Primary color of checkbox. (Example: 24;119;211) Fill color when box is checked.
propertyDescriptors.name: PrimaryColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Secondary color of checkbox. (Example: 255;255;255) Color of checkmark when box is checked.
propertyDescriptors.name: SecondaryColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Length of each side (px) Min: 10 Default: 24
propertyDescriptors.name: SideLength

propertyDescriptors.label: Line width of checkmark (px) Min: 1 Max: 1/4 * SideLength Default: 5
propertyDescriptors.name: LineWidth

propertyDescriptors.label: Radius of halo during hover. If blank, this is set to 1.5x the "SideLength".
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloRadius

propertyDescriptors.label: State of the checkbox has changed (Used in "ToggleChecked" function)
propertyDescriptors.name: ToggleChanged

propertyDescriptors.label: Disabled (the checkbox cannot be toggled by user)
propertyDescriptors.name: Disabled

propertyDescriptors.label: Border thickness (px) This border is only visible when the checkbox is unchecked.
propertyDescriptors.name: BorderThickness

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of halo during hover
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityHover

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of halo while being pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityPressed

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
The `Value` expression will return the position of the slider on the bar, from 0 to 1, where 0 is the left-side, and 1 is the right-side.

You can [watch this tutorial](https://youtu.be/iiTUwdAT_hs) showing how to use this extension - remember to attach it to a **Shape Painter** object.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: DraggableSliderControl
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Use a shape-painter object to draw a horizontal slider that can be dragged by the users.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Use a shape-painter object to draw a horizontal slider that can be dragged by the users. 

The `Value` expression will return the position of the slider on the bar, from 0 to 1, where 0 is the left-side, and 1 is the right-side.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: DraggableSliderControl

events.comment: Use darker halo while being dragged
Update "Value" based on the location of the thumb
Set inactive track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Set active track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw active track (2 pixels bigger than property)
Make sure thumb width is not smaller than track height (to prevent track ends from showing)
Detect hover/touch/click (but only if the layer and object is visible, and the object is not already being dragged)
Detect mouse clicks near track, start dragging
Draw halo when the mouse is hovering over thumb

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the slider is being dragged.
eventsFunctions.name: IsBeingDragged
eventsFunctions.sentence: Slider _PARAM0_ is being dragged using the _PARAM1_ behavior

events.comment: Make sure object gets re-drawn every frame

eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveTrackOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set inactive track opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveTrackOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set active track opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change shape of thumb (circle or rectangle)
eventsFunctions.fullName: Change shape of thumb (circle or rectangle)
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbShape

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the track that is LEFT of the thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveTrackColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set active track color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the track that is RIGHT of the thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveTrackColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set inactive track color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of thumb to a specific value.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbColor

eventsFunctions.description: Change the value of a slider to a specific value (this will move the thumb to the correct position).
eventsFunctions.name: SetValue

events.comment: Set the proper offset (this is move the slider)

eventsFunctions.description: The value of the slider (based on position of the thumb).
eventsFunctions.name: Value

propertyDescriptors.label: Shape of the thumb. Either "circle" or "rectangle".
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbShape

propertyDescriptors.label: Width of the thumb (px) Example: 20
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbWidth

propertyDescriptors.label: Height of the thumb (px) Example: 20
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbHeight

propertyDescriptors.label: Color string for the thumb. Example:  24;119;211
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the thumb. Example: 255
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Width of the track (px) Example: 200
propertyDescriptors.name: TrackWidth

propertyDescriptors.label: Height of the track (px) Example: 4
propertyDescriptors.name: TrackHeight

propertyDescriptors.label: Color string for the track that is RIGHT of the thumb. Example:  24;119;211  (Leave blank to use thumb color)
propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveTrackColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the track that is RIGHT of the thumb.  Example: 96
propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveTrackOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Color string for the track that is LEFT of the thumb. Example:  24;119;211 (Leave blank to use thumb color)
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveTrackColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the track that is LEFT of the thumb.  Example: 255
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveTrackOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Size of halo when the mouse hovers and clicks on the thumb. Example: 24
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloRadius

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of halo when the mouse hovers on the thumb. Example: 32
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityHover

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the halo that appears when the mouse clicks on the thumb. Example: 64
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityClick

propertyDescriptors.label: True if the thumb is being dragged
propertyDescriptors.name: IsBeingDragged

propertyDescriptors.label: Range (0,1) based on the thumb position on the track.  0=left, 1=right
propertyDescriptors.name: Value

propertyDescriptors.label: Number of pixels the thumb is from the left side of the track.
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbOffset

propertyDescriptors.label: If true, round the ends of the track.
propertyDescriptors.name: RoundedTrack

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @Bouh, @arthuro555
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: This extension adds tools to access the clipboard.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Clipboard

eventsFunctions.description:
Read the text from the clipboard asynchronously. As this is "asynchronous", this means that the variable won't be immediately filled with the text from the clipboard. Instead, it will be filled a few milliseconds later.

Note also that on web browsers, the user might be asked for permissions to read from the clipboard.
eventsFunctions.name: ReadTextCrossPlaform
eventsFunctions.sentence: Read clipboard and store text in _PARAM1_

parameters.description: Callback variable where to store the result
parameters.name: callback

eventsFunctions.description: Write the text in the clipboard
eventsFunctions.name: WriteText

eventsFunctions.description: Read the text from the clipboard (Windows, macOS, Linux only)
eventsFunctions.fullName: Get text from the clipboard (Windows, macOS, Linux)
eventsFunctions.name: ReadText

events.comment: This is here for retrocompatibility. Try to use the asynchronous readTextCrossPlatform action instead.

events.inlineCode:
const electron = runtimeScene.getGame().getRenderer().getElectron();
if (electron && electron.clipboard) eventsFunctionContext.returnValue = electron.clipboard.readText();
